name: zenc

scripts.serve: tsc --project ./functions && rm -rf ./public/* && concurrently -k 'firebase serve' 'tsc â€”-project ./functions --watch' 'cd frontend && ./node_modules/.bin/vue-cli-service build --no-clean --dest ../public --watch' 'cd frontend && ./node_modules/.bin/vue-cli-service serve' 'sleep 10 && browser-sync start --proxy "localhost:5000" --files "public/*"'

author: Sam Fruechtemeyer, Eric Bender, Elijah Watson
